data.title: Quick and cheap
data.text: Our family of 6 can eat some pizza especially for family movie nights once a week and little cesars is or go to! The pizza is ready when we are and the price is perfect! The restaurant is clean and the staff friendly!

data.title: Great value and quick
data.text: normally a line but moves quick, salads are great pizza seems like they are better and this location more ingredients easy in and easy out drive thru

data.title: pizza
data.text: Usually have food ready before hand which is great!  Staff friendly and pricing is affordable for the menu.

data.title: Pizza
data.text:
Excellant pizza, mostly I have purchased salad, $5.00 pizzas and individual slices with salad.
Their service drive thru and inside excellant.

data.title: Great this time, can be hit or miss but the manager cares and makes it right if you let her know
data.text: My most recent experience here was late night for a standard hot-n-ready pepperoni pizza which was amazing on this visit.  It was hot, fresh, properly cut all the way through the crust, with plenty of sauce and toppings.  This location is open later than any others around and that is a late night plus.  While my experiences here can be a bit hit or miss, the manager here care and values feedback.  She will make things right if you let her know.  If you have an issue with your order, the phone number to call is listed on every pizza box.

data.title: Terrible Pretzel Crust Pizza
data.text: I went here to try the Pretzel Crust Pizza ($6 as a hot and ready option) and it was terrible.  It was luke warm at best, very salty, salt sprinkled all over the pizza and not just the crust, cheese sauce instead of pizza sauce, and the pretzel crust was merely browned pizza crust and didn't resemble a pretzel (soft or hard) at all.  Disappointing.  This location seems to be losing their mojo and what once made this location one of my favorite locations to go to is slipping away.

data.title: Compared to other Little Caesars, this place is excellent
data.text: Better than most any other Little Caesars Pizza location I have been to, this location has good pizza, hot Hot-N-Ready pizzas, and a reasonably fast drive through window.  I wish they had spice (Zap-Packs) packs like some other locations do, but the product here is above other locations so stock up when you find a location that does have the packets.  I think part of the success here is frequent turn-over and a staff that cares.  This location is also open later than many around.  Worth driving past other Little Caesars locations to go here.
